name: Mrinal Kumar 0001
content: Mrinal Kumar Mrinal Kumar I am a faculty member in the School of Technology and Computer Science at Tata Institute of Fundamental Research in Mumbai. Research Interests I am broadly interested in problems in Computational Complexity, Algebraic Complexity, Algebra & Computation and Error Correcting Codes. Papers Contact Email : mrinal.kumar AT tifr.res.in Teaching Courses Fall 2025: Topics in Coding Theory Other links Workshop on Matrix Rigidity
